NEW_GUILD:
Welcome to **CyBorg %(version)s**!
`!cy cytube [channel name]` to get info about a CyTu.be channel.
You can also `!cy announce [channel name] to automatically post info and `!cy channel [discord channel mention]` to set where those announcements appear.
You can always `!cy help` for more information!

COMMAND.INFO_DESC: Displays general information, version number, and uptime.
COMMAND.CHUCK_DESC: Displays a random Chuck Norris fact.
COMMAND.CHUCK_ERR: Could not retrieve a Chuck Norris fact. ;_;
COMMAND.CYTUBE_DESC: Retrieves information about a CyTu.be room.
COMMAND.CYTUBE_ERR: That channel doesn't seem to exist, or it isn't active right now.
COMMAND.ADMIN_DESC: **(Admin)** Toggles admin rights for a user.
COMMAND.CHANNEL_DESC: **(Admin)** Sets the channel for CyTube announcements. If no channel is mentioned, CyBorg will announce in the channel in which the command is used.
COMMAND.CHANNEL_RESP: CyTu.be announcements will now appear in %(channel)s!
COMMAND.ERR_NOADMIN:
This command can only be used by admins.
**%(prefix)s %(command)s** to promote a user.
